name: Sombrio Grom's Rebel Shorts - Girls' - Youths
description: Versatile, freeride shorts that take mobility and abrasion resistance seriously. Smart innovations like a DWR coating and length that won't leave a gap at her knee-pads.Fabric is durable 4-way stretch nylon with lots of spandex.DWR finish repels moisture and mud.Bartack stitching throughout stress zones.Adjustable waistband.Locking zip fly with hidden snap and Velcro.Seamless crotch.Front and rear zippered pockets.Long 11.5 in. inseam.
